properties.areaDesc: Grand Isle; Western Essex; Eastern Essex; Eastern Clinton; Western Chittenden; Western Addison
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:44AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Much of the Champlain Valley along with Essex County in
New York.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult later tonight and
especially for the morning commute on Thursday. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause drifting
snow on Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin later tonight and become
moderate at times during the morning hours on Thursday before
tapering off in the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra
time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
